features.name: Broadsword
features.description: +6 to hit, 1d10+2 slashing damage and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack when she is not included in the attack

features.name: Poison Breath
features.description: Shoot a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw DC 14. On a failed save, the creature takes 2d10 poison damage On a successful save, it takes half as much damage.

features.name: Chromatic Warding
features.description: For 1 minute, you become immune to Cold.
